column2: BRIEF-SunCoke Energy Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.13 April 26 (Reuters) - SunCoke Energy Inc: * SUNCOKE ENERGY, INC. ANNOUNCES STRONG FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * REAFFIRM FULL-YEAR 2018 CONSOLIDATED ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE OF $240 MILLION TO $255 MILLION * QTRLY REVENUE $350.5 MILLION VERSUS $309.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
